text: Thanks for getting in touch again! Great news on your university offers! I decided to take a fairly big promotion at work, so I’ve moved back to our head office in Cambridge, and I’m not in Texas any more. I was a bit sad to leave Austin, but at least I’m back in Britain at a nice time of year and the sun has been out all weekend!

The first programming I did in a community was writing mods for Sim City 4, I think modding is a fun way to play with games and explore the rules and systems they are built in and do one of my favourite things about programming; try something out and see what happens next! I think it’s one of the worst things about more and more games being locked down, becoming online, having anti-cheat mechanisms built in, and coming as binary blobs on mobile - you can’t change anything about them! I used to like hacking on flash games when they were popular, and wrote tools that let me read and modify game saves for flash games - that was a form of modding too, especially when a game didn’t  validate the save file and you could change things further than the developer intended. I learned a lot from modding and it was some of the most fun I had with programming!

I think you want this page for information on student finance <https://www.gov.uk/get-undergraduate-student-loan> it looks like there are some forms to fill in that will tell you how much maintenance loan you can get, and a form to apply for the funding. I can’t read any further than that first page without creating an account though. There’s this guide too, but it doesn’t look much clearer! <http://media.slc.co.uk/sfe/1920/ft/sfe_how_you_are_assessed_and_paid_guide_1920_o.pdf> and another one here <https://www.ucas.com/student-finance-england/living-costs-full-time-students>

attachments.title: Get undergraduate student finance: step by step - GOV.UK
attachments.text: Check if you're eligible for a student loan, find out how much you can get, how to apply and when you start repaying.
attachments.fallback: Get undergraduate student finance: step by step - GOV.UK

attachments.title: Living costs for full-time students
attachments.text: You can get student finance to help towards your living costs while you’re at university or college. Find information here about maintenance loans, maintenance grants & special support grants.
attachments.fallback: UCAS: Living costs for full-time students

text: Nottingham seems like a great choice, I’ve been looking at the campus and course details and it sounds like a really nice course!

I think if you get a chance to work in America and it is something you want to do it would be a good opportunity to take. The work culture in America can be quite different from a British company, which can be a shock, but can also be a good thing. There’s a lot to see in America, and the computing and AI industries are so busy that there are lots of good companies to choose from doing really interesting things.
Congrats on your promotion, welcome back to England, thanks for the advise on the modding I think I will try that after my exams in june,
